sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../../components/Header"; import Message from "../../components/LoadingError/Error"; const PlaceOrderPage = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const navigate = useNavigate(); const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; const [consultouFrete, setConsultouFrete] = useState(false); const placeOrderHandler = () => { navigate("/paymentQRCode"); }; const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2); }; useEffect(() => { }) cart.itemsPrice = addDecimals(cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qtd, 0)); cart.shippingPrice = addDecimals(cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 30); cart.totalPrice = (Number(cart.itemsPrice) + Number(cart.shippingPrice)).toFixed(2); return ( <>
Cliente

{userInfo.name}

{userInfo.email}

Informações do pedido

Endereço de entrega:
{cart.shippingAddress.address}

Forma de pagamento:
{cart.paymentMethod}

Entregar em:

{cart.shippingAddress.city},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.address},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Seu carrinho está vazio ) : ( <> {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}

Quantidade

{item.qtd}

Subtotal

R${item.qtd * item.price}
))} )}
Produtos R${cart.itemsPrice}
Frete R${cart.shippingPrice}
Total R${cart.totalPrice}
{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? null : ( )}
); }; export default PlaceOrderPage;
